title: OneDrive: Favorite/Unfavorite additional file types and folders in OneDrive and Document Libraries
description: Adding files and folders to Favorites is a great way to mark content of personal importance and can help you get to the content you're looking for right away. We have made sure that the favorites experience is consistent across Microsoft 365 apps by building on top of the existing pinning and favorites experience. This release will include support for favoriting additional file types and folders from OneDrive web and Document Libraries.
